Quick Start â€‹

js
    import Vue from 'vue'
    import SmartyUI from 'smarty-ui'

    const App = {
        template: `<VCButton/>`,
    };

    createApp(App)
        .use(SmartyUI)
        .mount("#app");
    import Vue from 'vue'
    import SmartyUI from 'smarty-ui'

    const App = {
        template: `<VCButton/>`,
    };

    createApp(App)
        .use(SmartyUI)
        .mount("#app");
